html: Barr repeatedly confuses motive & intent, a basic 1st yr law student error. Two guys rob a bank, one w/ the motive of going on vacation in the Bahamas for 6 months, the other to give his beloved mother a great Mother’s Day gift. Their motives are irrelevant & they’re both guilty.

html: Congress & the President approved a 1.9% pay raise for federal employees in 2019, but an entire month has passed & federal workers have yet to see this raise reflected in their paychecks. text:
Congress & the President approved a 1.9% pay raise for federal employees in 2019, but an entire month has passed & federal workers have yet to see this raise reflected in their paychecks.

html: After Pulse we shut down the House floor to demand action on gun violence. After Parkland we marched to demand action on gun violence. This week, we will vote to require background checks on all gun sales. I’m voting YES on #HR8
text:
After Pulse we shut down the House floor to demand action on gun violence. 

After Parkland we marched to demand action on gun violence. 

This week, we will vote to require background checks on all gun sales. 

I’m voting YES on #HR8

html: .@POTUS is asking why Members of Congress haven’t done their jobs and passed a bill funding border security? We did. The House has put forth bipartisan adequate solutions — that the Senate ALREADY PASSED. It’s the White House that is refusing to act. This is on him.
text:
.@POTUS is asking why Members of Congress haven’t done their jobs and passed a bill funding border security? 

We did. 

The House has put forth bipartisan adequate solutions — that the Senate ALREADY PASSED. It’s the White House that is refusing to act. 

This is on him.
